snippet: Clashes in the Indian state of Jammu and Kashmir left four militant fighters dead, the Indian Army said.
abstract: Indian Army reports that four militants were killed in gun battle in state of Jammu and Kashmir on disputed border with Pakistan.
lead_paragraph: Clashes in the Indian state of Jammu and Kashmir left four militant fighters dead, the Indian Army said.

headline.main: Four Militants Killed in Gun Battle With Indian Troops
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; India: Troops and Militants Battle
